This article can probably be considered as the first of a series on the site philosophy, if you want to say so. To start, what is better to talk about, if not everything that led to the birth of the site and began to characterize it? When, 3 months ago now, I had just started to conceive the ctt site, one of the things I felt was that I didn’t have a place in which to arrange my stuff - the stuff to be preserved and shared publicly, at least - in a way that made it tidy, available, watchable, usable, and loss-proof.
